resource_dependency.barberDataSchema: CREATE TABLE barbers (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, contact_info TEXT, specialization TEXT, photo_url TEXT);
resource_dependency.serviceDataSchema: CREATE TABLE services (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT, duration INTEGER, price DECIMAL(10, 2));
resource_dependency.notificationLogSchema: CREATE TABLE notifications (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, client_contact TEXT, message TEXT, sent_at TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);
resource_dependency.adminAuthSchema: CREATE TABLE admins (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE NOT NULL, password_hash TEXT);

function: Provide backend API endpoints to manage barbers, services, and track notification logs.
static_description: Backend server exposing RESTful endpoints for CRUD operations on barbers, services, and notification logs. Connects to PostgreSQL database using provided environment variables.

resource_dependency.whatsappAPI: An external API capable of sending WhatsApp messages, such as Twilio's WhatsApp Business API.

function: Enable sending WhatsApp notifications to clients from the system.
static_description: Backend integration with WhatsApp messaging service allowing automated client communication through an external provider.

function: Display a browsable list of barbers with their name, photo, and specialization.
static_description: Grid or list layout showing individual barber cards containing a profile image (`barberImagePlaceholder`), name, and specialization details fetched from `barberListEndpoint`.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a barber card navigates to the barber’s detailed view page using `barberDetailsEndpoint`.

function: Allow users to browse all available services along with name, description, and pricing.
static_description: A structured layout presenting each service in a card format displaying title, short description, duration, and cost retrieved from `serviceListEndpoint`.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on a service card opens a modal or redirects to a detailed service view via `serviceDetailsEndpoint`.

resource_dependency.validationRules: { name: required | string, contact_info: optional | string, specialization: required | string }

function: Enable authenticated administrators to add new barbers to the system.
static_description: Form interface with labeled input fields (`createBarberFormFields`) and a submit button positioned under the 'Manage Barbers' section. Includes validation indicators based on `validationRules`.

interaction_and_states.description: Submitting the form sends data to `barberCreationEndpoint`. Displays success/error feedback after submission.
Each field validates upon losing focus according to defined `validationRules`, showing inline error messages when invalid.

resource_dependency.validationRules: { name: required | string, description: optional | string, duration: required | integer > 0, price: required | decimal >= 0 }

function: Allow authenticated administrators to register new services offered by the barber shop.
static_description: Input form with clearly labeled fields (`createServiceFormFields`) and a save button within the 'Manage Services' area. Inline validation warnings appear per `validationRules`.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon clicking Save, form data is posted to `serviceCreationEndpoint`. User receives confirmation or failure alert accordingly.
Validation checks execute per `validationRules` once user exits a field. Invalid entries trigger visible error cues.

function: Facilitate sending WhatsApp notifications to clients and maintain a record of sent messages.
static_description: Interface includes a message composition panel with `whatsappNotificationFormFields` and a Send button. Below it shows a table listing previous notifications retrieved from `notificationHistoryEndpoint`.

interaction_and_states.description: Triggers POST request to `sendNotificationEndpoint` with composed message. Refreshes notification history display afterward.
Re-fetches notification logs from `notificationHistoryEndpoint` and updates the displayed table.

function: Apply consistent styling across the entire website with a snow-themed background and dim gray interface elements.
static_description: Entire site uses a repeating `backgroundSnowImage` behind all pages. All interactive and structural components use `interfaceDimGrayColor` for backgrounds, borders, and text containers.

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience on various devices including desktops, tablets, and smartphones.
static_description: Layout adjusts dynamically based on screen size using CSS media queries aligned with `responsiveBreakpoints`. Content reflows appropriately while maintaining usability.

function: Protect administrative features with secure authentication mechanism.
static_description: Login page accessible at `/admin/login` featuring username and password inputs (`loginFormFields`). Successful login grants access to protected routes like `/admin/dashboard`.

interaction_and_states.description: Valid credentials result in token storage under `authTokenStorageKey` and redirection to dashboard. Invalid attempts show appropriate error message.
Clears stored auth token and redirects back to public-facing homepage or login screen.

resource_dependency.routerLibrary: React Router DOM or equivalent framework-specific routing solution

function: Implement client-side navigation between different sections of the application without full page reloads.
static_description: Navigation bar links point to distinct views such as Home, Barbers, Services, Manage Barbers, and Manage Services. Routing handled internally by `routerLibrary`.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking navigation items updates browser URL and renders corresponding component view seamlessly.
